MarkedMod:Acupuncture.NAME: Acupuncture
MarkedMod:Acupuncture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Tag to your hand.

MarkedMod:FirstStrike.NAME: First Strike
MarkedMod:FirstStrike.DESCRIPTION: If the target has no *Mark, Apply !M! *Mark. NL *Exhaust

MarkedMod:GentlePulse.NAME: Gentle Pulse
MarkedMod:GentlePulse.DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark. NL *Exhaust
MarkedMod:GentlePulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Retain NL All enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark. NL *Exhaust.

MarkedMod:OneThousandNeedles.NAME: 1000 Needles
MarkedMod:OneThousandNeedles.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Mark. NL All enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark. NL Whenever you *Scry, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

MarkedMod:PinPointDefense.NAME: Pin Point Defense
MarkedMod:PinPointDefense.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, apply 3 *Mark. NL Gain !M! *Block whenever you apply *Mark.

MarkedMod:GracefulMovements.NAME: Graceful Movements
MarkedMod:GracefulMovements.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! *Tag to your hand.
MarkedMod:GracefulMovements.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add !M! *Tag to your hand.

MarkedMod:SlowDance.NAME: Slow Dance
MarkedMod:SlowDance.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, enter Dance of Death and Exhaust.
MarkedMod:SlowDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, enter Dance of Death.

MarkedMod:NorthStar.NAME: North Star
MarkedMod:NorthStar.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 *Mark X times to all enemies. NL All enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark X times. End your turn. NL *Exhaust.
MarkedMod:NorthStar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 *Mark X+1 times to all enemies. NL All enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark X+1 times. End your turn. NL *Exhaust.

MarkedMod:ChiBlocker.NAME: Chi Blocker
MarkedMod:ChiBlocker.DESCRIPTION: Remove all *Mark. NL If at least !M! *Mark was removed, the target is *Stunned.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The enemy hasn't been marked yet!
